QuestData.Title: The Ruins Fought Back
QuestData.Description: Something set off a trap in the cave, and then the ruins themselves came tae life. I expect that most of our lads still in that cave aren't in fightin' form.$b$bCould ye clear out some of the livin' ruins tae help them escape?
QuestData.CompletionText: Did ye clear out those constructs? The bloodthirsty things aren't helpin' anyone by bein' in there.
QuestData.RewardText: I've fought off spirits afore, but ne'er the actual ruins themselves.
